020import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageEngine;
024
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028/**
029 * CassandraEngine
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 1.0.0.2
033 */
034public class CassandraEngine implements StorageEngine {
035  private final Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables = new HashMap<>();
036
037  @Override
038  public String name() {
039    return "cassandra";
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public void initialize(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
044    PluginCore.log().debug("Cassandra Storage Engine initialized.");
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public void reset(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
049    PluginCore.log().debug("Cassandra Storage reset logic needs implementation.");
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public void backup(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
054    PluginCore.log().debug("Cassandra Backup logic needs implementation.");
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public Map<Class<?>, Datable<?>> datables() {
059    return datables;
060  }
061}
